entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 near noon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then a few rain showers or flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low.
